original_title: The Making of Rocky vs. Drago by Sylvester Stallone
overview: Fight alongside Sylvester Stallone as he creates a brand-new director's cut of Rocky IV: ROCKY VS. DRAGO. This feature-length documentary offers a personal and uncompromising look into the editing process, captured by Sly's longtime friend and fellow filmmaker John Herzfeld.
title: The Making of Rocky vs. Drago by Sylvester Stallone
